caption: Two girls are communicating using sign language in a room. They both seem very upset. One of the girls goes to the edge of the pool and vomits. The other girl brings a towel to help clean her up. They then sit at a table and continue communicating. Afterwards, they hug tightly. One of the girls sits at the computer and starts typing, chatting with someone online. The two girls lie down on the bed to sleep. A boy sits in front of a computer with LED lights attached to his body, kissing the computer screen. In the distance, there's a field, and a girl is using binoculars to gaze into the distance.
